value.title: Script for Creating TIME Table in Power BI with Hours, Minutes and Seconds Buckets

value.title: Take Your Power BI Visualization to the Next Level using Small Multiples
value.excerpt: Small multiple is a relatively recent feature on some of the Power BI visuals.
